fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Kill a player at night.
- Recruit a player during the day, turning them into the Sidekick (4423B). Only usable if there is no living Sidekick.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot recruit REFs. You can recruit literally anyone else, except those with conversion immunity.
- You are notified if you fail to recruit someone. Additionally, if your target is recruited, they learn your identity.
- You win with the Sidekick (4423B) and vice versa. You also win with other Jackals.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
